data.title: Braver Players Theater Company
data.meta_description: Braver Players is a theater company located in Costa Mesa, CA that provides children and teens with musical theater training, acting classes, vocal classes, training for OCSA and college auditions, theater summer camps, and on-stage experience.

Braver Players Studio

151 Kalmus Unit H9(off of Redhill)

Costa Mesa, CA 92626

Tel: (949)878-6376

Email: contactbraverplayers@gmail.com

Refund Policy

• No refunds will be given for any camp or production class once casting has taken place.

• No refunds due to any natural disaster, pandemic, or emergency if Braver Players is offering alternative options to finish the term, session, production or camp.

• There will be no refunds once the class, camp, or production begins. We keep our camps and classes small and do not have a wait list and you are often taking the place that someone else was turned away from having when sold out.

• There are no refunds due to scheduling. Our year long calendar is in place and upon starting classes or camps, the schedule is given to you. Schedule is also available any time online or by calling or emailing the studio. It is your responsibility to add our dates to you calendar and to adhere to them.

• There are no refunds with tickets to productions, only exchanges/credits.
